column4: Can anybody help me with a problem regarding a wireless card?
if only things were that easy ;) what kind of wireless card?
could you pastebin the following 2 commands, ipconfig, iwconfig
have a usb drive or such
mount it, and then like iwconfig > /media/usbdisk/iwconfig.txt
missing IP addresses, or no MAC address
oh wait.. I had this problem.. which is why I am on suse now..
yeah I use that on suse
